Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: cesar padron
Reviews.Content: excellent choise in this cell phone and great colour too. i recomend it. no more to say. . . . . . . .

Reviews.Title: good phone
Reviews.Author: luis
Reviews.Content: one of the best phone from samsung i really enjoyed using this phone it fits nice in your hand,, i like the amoled display

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed
Reviews.Author: Marc Riolo
Reviews.Content: I was able to use this with Wal-Mart's StraightTalk service, which was my reason for buying it. Phone has more features than I need, and works great.

Reviews.Title: BECAREFUL SELLER: HassleFreeCell sends a cellphone with chinesse battery without NFC and GPS damaged!
Reviews.Author: Jesus Piñeiro
Reviews.Content: HassleFreeCell sends me a cellphone with chinesse battery (without NFC) and GPS damaged, and it's very extranged the cellphone had been rooted. Buy Cellphone with another seller.

Reviews.Title: Looooove it!
Reviews.Author: DCJones
Reviews.Content: Very fast delivery!  Bought one for myself and my hubby for his birthday and we are both very happy.  Also they came with Jellybean not Ice cream so that was a pleasant surprise.  Can't stop fiddling with it.

Reviews.Title: Galaxy S3 I9300
Reviews.Author: Fantasy Reviewer
Reviews.Content: The Galaxy S3 model I9300 is a good phone. I especially loved the expansion micro SD card option. I loaded music, movies, etc. My particular phone seemed to give me some problems with recognizing my SIM card. I have not seen others complain of this problem. I ended up returning my phone. On the Go Solutions was very good about the process and gave me a full refund. Thanks On The Go Solutions.

Reviews.Title: As advertised.
Reviews.Author: Joshua J Kutella
Reviews.Content: Great phone, flexible, without the proprietary constraints of my old iPhone.  Great screen.  I use it overseas and back home with a simple switch of my sim card.

Reviews.Title: Unhappy with this product.
Reviews.Author: Phil Azancot
Reviews.Content: The phone is not user friendly in the sense that there are too many inputs for what you want to do. Something as simple as making a phone call.When you load Skipe and use it, it wants to use Skipe for every call, even local calls. You have to disable the skipe then log back in for when you need it.The phone has too long of a lag between pages and is very frustrating.I might go back to an HTC until Samsung works all the bugs out.  Thanks  Phil

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Fernando Gomez
Reviews.Content: After having a disappointment with my iPhone 4S I decided to change to Samsung since I needed a pjobe urgently and this was even cheaper than buying a new iPhone. Surprisingly this phone not only met my basic expectations but more. It isn't fast as the iPhone but does the job ans more.

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: Fabiola Perez
Reviews.Content: excelente! funciona bien, llego en muy buen estado y el telefono cumple con las expectativas asi que lo recomiendo sigan asi!!!

2G Network GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 & 3G Network HSDPA 850 / 900 / 1900 / 2100
Will NOT work with Verizon or any other CDMA Carriers.
Android OS, v4.0 (Ice Cream Sandwich)
16 GB built-in storage, Quad Core 1.4 Ghz
Dimensions: 136.6 x 70.6 x 8.6mm
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Galaxy S III/S3 GT-I9300 Factory Unlocked Phone - International Version (Titanium Grey))
